job.title: Software Engineer - Remote
job.description: ltpgtour client has large projects and is looking for software engineers to help support themltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll doampnbspltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtbuild solutions that meet our customers needs and are maintainable costeffective and responsiveltligtltligtpartner with our product design and infrastructure teams to build or enhance applications and servicesampnbspltligtltligtown the reliability of the application and services by partnering operations and infrastructure to build scale and monitor services and applicationsltligtltligtdesign develop test debug and maintain software code for our highperformance business applicationsltligtltligtanalyze and optimize user interface and backend application code for efficiencyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll needltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtat least years of professional experience building highperformance reliable systems in a complex multitiered and distributed environmentltligtltligtdesign and implement services in a variety of programming languages including nodejs golangltligtltligtsuccessful deployment of production code at scaleltligtltligtproven track record of writing maintainable code which includes unit tests readable code and decent implementations of design patternsltligtltligtexpertise with learning new technologies and familiarity with our tech stack javascript nodejs go reactjs elasticsearch nsq graphql and postgresltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtto schedule an interview with our recruiter please visit httpscalendlycomlaurenjessupvaconeedsltpgt
